Bahman-jalali.title: Bahman Jalali
Bahman-jalali.lead: The official site Bahman Jalali Coding by Siamak Mokhtari. He was a renowned Iranian photographer who played a significant role in educating a new generation of Iranian photographers.

TarlanParvaneh.title: Birthday Online
TarlanParvaneh.lead: It has a Powerful CMS with PHP that it can launch Birthday Online with Funny features. It was launched first for Tarlan Parvaneh. The project is closed.

AyandeBank.title: Ayande Bank (Por-Az-Zendegi)
AyandeBank.lead: Por-Az-Zendegi is a Campaign for Iranian New Year of Ayandeh Bank – A part of the government's privatization of the banking system. Means Future Bank is an Iranian banking establishment offering retail and commercial services.

Siamak.us.title: Siamak.us
Siamak.us.lead: New Generation of Siamak.us with new things. Refresh Design of Persian Notes a good experience for readers with new Typography. It is also have Native–js without any extra js frameworks and I'm very excited for it.

Baarande.title: Baarande
Baarande.lead: Community of Iranian Web developers and Websites. Baarande founded by @FictionTeam at Tehran. it's like baby-startup! We Try to Succeed with Passion.

Licon.title: Licon — Pure icons CSS3
Licon.lead: Licon is a simple, useful and lightness pack—icon that made with Pure CSS3. It has both Sass and LESS versions. Featured on Smashing Magzine, Webdesignerdepot, Offical Adobe Edge Twitter, etc. with 20,000 unique users (Google analytics)
